definitions.example: Mix the eggs and milk with the flour until the consistency is smooth.

definitions.definition: To combine (items from two or more sources normally kept separate).
definitions.example: Don't mix the meat recipes with the dairy recipes.

definitions.definition: To form by mingling; to produce by the stirring together of ingredients; to concoct from different parts.
definitions.example: Yellow and blue paint mix to make green.

definitions.definition: To blend by the use of a mixer (machine).
definitions.example: Mix the egg whites until they are stiff.
I'll mix the rhythm tracks down to a single track.

definitions.definition: To produce a finished version of (a recording).
definitions.example: I'm almost done mixing this song.

definitions.definition: To unite with in company; to join; to associate.
The result of mixing two or more substances; a mixture.
definitions.example: Now add the raisins to the mix.

definitions.definition: The result of combining items normally kept separate.
definitions.example: My recipe file was now a mix of meat and dairy.

definitions.definition: The result of mixing several tracks.
The finished version of a recording.
definitions.example: I've almost finished the mix for this song.
